# Teaching

I am an official course tutor for Princeton University courses through the
McGraw Center for Teaching and Learning. 

I currently tutor for MAT175 - [Mathematics for Economics/Life Sciences](https://registrar.princeton.edu/course-offerings/course-details?term=1214&courseid=012060) and 
POL345 - [Introduction to Quantitative Social Science](https://registrar.princeton.edu/course-offerings/course-details?term=1214&courseid=013781)
